# Order of the Obelisk
## Overview
---
## Connections
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Ajinan City Guard]] ; The guard can call on the Order of the Obelisk.
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Obelisk Square]] ; The Order of the Obelisk patrols Obelisk Square heavily.
Resident: [[Ajinan]] ; The Order of the Obelisk is located in Ajinan.
